member.name: SPACTION
member.summary: Describes an action being performed that requires progress to be shown to the user using an interface.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_APPLYINGATTRIBS
member.summary: A set of attributes are being applied to files.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_DOWNLOADING
member.summary: A file is being downloaded from a remote source.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_SEARCHING_INTERNET
member.summary: An Internet search is being performed.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_UPLOADING
member.summary: A file is being uploaded to a remote source.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_SEARCHING_FILES
member.summary: A local search is being performed.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_DELETING
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. A deletion is being performed.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_RENAMING
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. A renaming action is being performed.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_FORMATTING
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. A formatting action is being performed.

member.name: SPACTION.SPACTION_COPY_MOVING
member.summary: Windows 7 and later. A copy or move action is being performed.
